entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 1:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain late this evening then to light snow before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
